description.english: Complete the Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.russian: Завершите Лабиринт в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.brazilian: Complete o Labirinto Normal em uma liga não Hardcore.
description.german: Schließt das Labyrinth in einer Nicht-Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto en una Liga no Hardcore.

description.english: Complete the Cruel Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.brazilian: Complete o Labirinto Cruel em uma liga não Hardcore.
description.russian: Завершите Жестокий Лабиринт  в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.german: Schließt das grausame Labyrinth in einer Nicht-Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Cruel dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Cruel en una Liga no Hardcore.

description.english: Complete the Merciless Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.brazilian: Complete o Labirinto Impiedoso em uma liga não Hardcore.
description.russian: Завершите Безжалостный Лабиринт  в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.german: Schließt das gnadenlose Labyrinth in einer Nicht-Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Impitoyable dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Despiadado en una Liga no Hardcore.

description.english: Finish the Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.russian: Завершите Лабиринт в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Normal em uma Liga Hardcore.
description.german: Schließt das Labyrinth in einer Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto en una Liga Hardcore.

description.english: Finish the Cruel Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.russian: Завершите Жестокий Лабиринт в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Cruel em uma Liga Hardcore.
description.german: Schließt das grausame Labyrinth in einer Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Cruel dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Cruel en una Liga Hardcore.

description.english: Finish Merciless Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.russian: Завершите Безжалостный Лабиринт в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Impiedoso em uma Liga Hardcore.
description.german: Schließt das gnadenlose Labyrinth in einer Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Impitoyable dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Despiadado en una Liga Hardcore.

description.english: Kill Brutus, Warden of Axiom Prison.
description.brazilian: Mate Brutus, o Carcereiro da Prisão Axiom.
description.russian: Убейте Изувера, смотрителя Тюрьмы Аксиомы.
description.german: Tötet Brutus, den Wächter des Axiom-Gefängnisses.
description.french: Tuez Brutus, le Geôlier de la Prison d'Axiom.
description.spanish: Mata a Brutus, Guardián de la Prisión de Axiom.

description.english: Kill Merveil, the Siren.
description.french: Tuez Merveil, la Sirène.
description.spanish: Mata a Merveil, la Sirena.
description.russian: Убейте сирену Мервейл.
description.brazilian: Mate Merveil, a Sereia.

description.english: Vanquish the Vaal Oversoul.
description.brazilian: Elimine o Sobrealma Vaal.
description.russian: Развейте Вседушу ваал.
description.french: Terrassez l'Âme souveraine vaal.
description.spanish: Destierra al Alma Suprema Vaal.

description.english: Defeat Piety in her laboratory.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Piety em seu laboratório.
description.russian: Победите Веру в её лаборатории.
description.french: Triomphez de Piety dans son laboratoire.
description.spanish: Derrota a Piedad en su laboratorio.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Ranger.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como a Caçadora.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку охотницей.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant que Rôdeuse.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como una Cazadora.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Templar.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como o Templário.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку жрецом.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant que Templier.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como un Templario.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Witch.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como a Bruxa.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку ведьмой.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant que Sorcière.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como una Bruja.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Shadow.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como o Sicário.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку бандитом.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant qu'Ombre.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como un Sombra.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Duelist.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como o Duelista.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку гладиатором.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant que Duelliste.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como un Duelista.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Marauder.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como o Marauder.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку дикарем.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant que Maraudeur.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como un Guerrero.

description.english: Kill Dominus as the Scion.
description.brazilian: Mate o Dominus como a Herdeira.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку дворянкой.
description.french: Tuez Dominus en tant qu'Héritière.
description.spanish: Mata a Dóminus como una Heredera.

description.english: Free the Scion.
description.brazilian: Liberte a Herdeira.
description.russian: Освободите дворянку.
description.french: Libérez l'Héritière.
description.spanish: Libera a la Heredera.

description.english: Reach level 60 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 60 com um personagem Não Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 60 уровня в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 60 dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 60 con un personaje no Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 70 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 70 com um personagem Não Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 70 уровня в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 70 dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 70 con un personaje no Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 80 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 80 com um personagem Não Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 80 уровня в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 80 dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 80 con un personaje no Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 90 as a non-Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 90 com um personagem Não Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 90 уровня в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 90 dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 90 con un personaje no Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 60 as a Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 60 com um personagem Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 60 уровня в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 60 dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 60 con un personaje Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 70 as a Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 70 com um personagem Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 70 уровня в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 70 dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 70 con un personaje Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 80 as a Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 80 com um personagem Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 80 уровня в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 80 dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 80 con un personaje Hardcore.

description.english: Reach level 90 as a Hardcore character.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 90 com um personagem Hardcore.
description.russian: Достигните 90 уровня в лиге с одной жизнью.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 90 dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 90 con un personaje Hardcore.

description.english: Tag each waypoint.
description.russian: Откройте все порталы на всех уровнях сложности одним и тем же героем.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os pontos de passagem.
description.german: Markiert mit einem Charakter jeden Wegpunkt in jedem Schwierigkeitsgrad.
description.french: Activez tous les Points de téléportation.
description.spanish: Toca todos los traslocadores.

description.english: Complete each side-quest.
description.russian: Выполните все необязательные задания на каждом уровне сложности.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões paralelas
description.german: Schließt mit einem Charakter jede Nebenquest in jedem Schwierigkeitsgrad ab.
description.french: Terminez toutes les quêtes secondaires.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones secundarias.

description.english: Listen to all optional NPC dialogue.
description.brazilian: Ouça a todos os diálogos dos NPCs.
description.russian: Прослушайте все необязательные реплики персонажей одним и тем же героем.
description.german: Lauscht mit einem Charakter in jedem Akt allen optionalen NSC-Dialogen.
description.french: Écoutez tous les dialogues facultatifs des PNJ.
description.spanish: Escucha todos los diálogos opcionales de los NPC.

description.english: Discover all environmental lore.
description.brazilian: Descubra toda a história ambiental.
description.russian: Найдите все объекты с местными преданиями.
description.german: Entdeckt mit einem Charakter in jedem Akt alles Wissen in der Umgebung.
description.french: Découvrez toutes les histoires et les connaissances laissées dans l'environnement.
description.spanish: Descubre toda la historia del entorno.

description.english: Create a Unique item using an Orb of Chance.
description.brazilian: Crie um item Único usando um Orbe da Chance.
description.russian: Создайте уникальный предмет с помощью Сферы удачи.
description.german: Erschafft mit einer Sphäre der Möglichkeiten einen einzigartigen Gegenstand.
description.french: Créez un Objet unique à l'aide d'un Orbe de chance.
description.spanish: Crea un ítem Único usando un Orbe de Azar.

description.english: Create an item with six linked sockets using an Orb of Fusing.
description.brazilian: Crie um item com seis encaixes conectados usando o Orbe da Fusão.
description.russian: Создайте предмет с шестью связанными гнездами с помощью Сферы соединения.
description.german: Erschafft mit einer Verbindungssphäre einen Gegenstand mit sechs verbundenen Fassungen.
description.french: Reliez les six châsses d'un objet à l'aide d'un Orbe de fusion.
description.spanish: Crea un ítem con seis engarces vinculados usando un Orbe de Fusión.

description.english: Have a Skill Gem reach level 20.
description.brazilian: Aprimore uma Gema de Habilidade até o nível 20.
description.russian: Доведите камень умения до 20 уровня.
description.french: Faites évoluer une Gemme d'aptitude jusqu'au niveau 20.
description.spanish: Haz que una Gema alcance nivel 20.

description.english: Have 15 combined Endurance, Frenzy, and Power Charges active simultaneously.
description.brazilian: Tenha 15 Cargas de Tolerância, Frenesi e Poder combinadas e ativas simultaneamente.
description.russian: Накопите в общей сумме 15 активных зарядов выносливости, бешенства и энергии одновременно.
description.german: Erreicht, dass 15 Widerstands-, Raserei- und Energie-Ladungen gleichzeitig aktiv sind.
description.french: Cumulez au total 15 Charges d'endurance, de frénésie et de pouvoir simultanément actives.
description.spanish: Ten 15 Cargas de Aguante, Frenesí y Poder combinadas activas simultáneamente.

description.english: Slay an enemy that is simultaneously Ignited, Shocked, and Frozen.
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo que esteja Incendiado, Eletrizado e Congelado ao mesmo tempo.
description.russian: Убейте врага, который одновременно подожжен, заморожен и поражен шоком.
description.german: Tötet einen Gegner, der gleichzeitig entzündet, geschockt und eingefroren ist.
description.french: Tuez un ennemi qui est à la fois Embrasé, Gelé et Électrocuté.
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo que esté simultáneamente Quemado, Electrocutado y Congelado.

description.english: Equip a Rare or Unique item in every non-Flask slot.
description.brazilian: Equipe um item Único ou Raro em todos os espaços que não são para Frascos.
description.russian: Заполните все ячейки предметов редкими или уникальными предметами. Ячейки для флаконов не учитываются.
description.german: Rüstet einen seltenen und einen einzigartigen Gegenstand in jedem Slot aus (Fläschchen ausgenommen).
description.french: Soyez intégralement équipé d'Objets rares ou uniques (hors Flacons).
description.spanish: Equipa un ítem Raro o Único en cada espacio que no sea de Frasco.

description.english: Shatter 5 monsters with a single action.
description.brazilian: Estilhace 5 monstros com uma única ação.
description.russian: Одним действием разбейте 5 замороженных монстров.
description.german: Zerschmettert 5 Monster mit einer einzigen Aktion.
description.french: Fracassez 5 monstres en une seule action.
description.spanish: Haz añicos 5 monstruos con una misma acción.

description.english: Equip a Unique item.
description.brazilian: Equipe um Item Único.
description.russian: Наденьте уникальный предмет.
description.french: Équipez-vous d'un Objet unique.
description.spanish: Equipa un ítem Único.

description.english: Allocate a Keystone Passive Skill.
description.brazilian: Distribua uma Habilidade Pedra Passiva Angular
description.russian: Выберите ключевое пассивное умение.
description.french: Attribuez un point dans un Talent passif charnière.
description.spanish: Asigna una Habilidad Pasiva de Piedra Angular.

description.english: Fully clear an end-game Map area.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente uma área de um Mapa do endgame.
description.russian: Перебейте всех монстров в завершающей игру области карты.
description.french: Débarrassez une Carte de fin de jeu de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Completa un área de Mapa del fin del juego.

description.english: Help all three Bandit Lords.
description.brazilian: Ajude todos os três Lordes Bandidos.
description.russian: Помогите всем троим главарям разбойников.
description.french: Aidez les trois Seigneurs bandits.
description.spanish: Ayuda a los tres Señores Bandidos.

description.english: Open a Large Chest.
description.brazilian: Abra um Baú Grande.
description.russian: Откройте большой сундук.
description.french: Ouvrez un Grand coffre.
description.spanish: Abre un Cofre Grande.

description.english: Have 3 Totems alive at one time.
description.brazilian: Tenha 3 Totens vivos ao mesmo tempo.
description.russian: Располагайте 3 действующими тотемами одновременно.
description.french: Invoquez un total de 3 Totems à la fois.
description.spanish: Ten 3 Tótems vivos al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Reach level 8 in any Race Event.
description.brazilian: Alcance o nível 8 em qualquer Evento de Corrida.
description.russian: Достигните 8 уровня в любом гоночном событии.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau 8 lors d'une Course.
description.spanish: Alcanza nivel 8 en cualquier Evento de Carrera.

description.english: Capture a flag during any CTF match.
description.brazilian: Pegue uma Bandeira durante uma partida CTF.
description.russian: Захватите флаг.
description.french: Capturez un drapeau au cours d'un match PvP.
description.spanish: Captura una bandera durante cualquier combate de Captura la Bandera.

description.english: Have 9 Raised Zombies alive at one time.
description.brazilian: Tenha 9 Zumbis Evocados ao mesmo tempo.
description.russian: Располагайте 9 поднятыми зомби одновременно.
description.french: Réanimez un total de 9 Zombies à la fois.
description.spanish: Ten 9 Zombis Levantados al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Have at least 75% resistance to Fire, Ice and Lightning.
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 75% de resistência a Fogo, Frio e Raio.
description.russian: Доведите сопротивление огню, холоду и молниям хотя бы до 75%.
description.german: Besitzt mindestens 75 % Widerstand gegen Feuer, Kälte und Blitz.
description.french: Ayez au moins 75% de Résistance au feu, au froid et à la foudre.
description.spanish: Ten al menos 75% de resistencia a Fuego, Hielo y Rayo.

description.english: Have a Unique Map drop within a Unique Map.
description.brazilian: Encontre um Mapa Único em um Mapa Único.
description.russian: Получите уникальную карту в качестве трофея, находясь в области уникальной карты.
description.german: Findet eine einzigartige Karte in einer einzigartigen Karte.
description.french: Découvrez une Carte unique dans une Carte unique.
description.spanish: Consigue que un Mapa Único caiga en un Mapa Único.

description.english: Have a Unique Item drop in the Twilight Strand.
description.russian: Получите уникальный предмет в качестве трофея в области Сумрачное взморье в 1 Акте.
description.brazilian: Encontre um Item Único na Costa do Crepúsculo.
description.german: Findet einen einzigartigen Gegenstand an der Zwielichtküste.
description.french: Découvrez un Objet unique sur le Rivage du Crépuscule.
description.spanish: Logra que un Ítem Único caiga en el Litoral Crepuscular.

description.english: Fully clear the Dread Thicket
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente o Matagal Horrendo
description.russian: Перебейте всех монстров в Чащобе.
description.french: Débarrassez le Bosquet de l'effroi de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia completamente el Matorral Pavoroso.

description.english: Allocate a character's fourth Keystone Passive.
description.brazilian: Distribua a quarta Habilidade Pedra Passiva Angular de um personagem.
description.russian: Выберите четвертое особое пассивное умение героя.
description.german: Weist einem Charakter eine vierte passive Schlüsselfertigkeit zu.
description.french: Dépensez un point dans quatre Talents passifs charnières.
description.spanish: Asigna la cuarta Pasiva de Piedra Angular de un personaje.

description.english: Fully clear the Catacombs.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente as Catacumbas.
description.russian: Перебейте всех монстров в Катакомбах.
description.french: Débarrassez les Catacombes de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia completamente las Catacumbas.

displayName.french: Mettre la barre encore plus haut

description.english: Have at least 90% resistance to any Element.
description.brazilian: Tenha pelo menos 90% de resistência a qualquer Elemento.
description.russian: Доведите сопротивление любой из стихий хотя бы до 90%.
description.german: Besitzt mindestens 90 % Widerstand gegen jedes Element.
description.french: Atteignez 90% de Résistance ou plus dans l'un des trois éléments.
description.spanish: Ten al menos 90% de resistencia a cualquier Elemento.

description.english: Fully clear the Archives.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente os Arquivos.
description.russian: Перебейте всех монстров в Архивах.
description.french: Débarrassez les Archives de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia Completamente los Archivos.

description.english: Join a public party.
description.brazilian: Entre em um grupo público.
description.russian: Присоединитесь к открытой группе.
description.german: Schließt Euch einer öffentlichen Gruppe an.
description.french: Rejoignez un groupe public.
description.spanish: Únete a un grupo público.

displayName.french: Videz la Grotte du Cimetière de navires
displayName.spanish: Completo: Cueva del Cementerio de Barcos

description.english: Fully clear the Ship Graveyard Cave.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente a Caverna do Cemitério de Navios.
description.russian: Перебейте всех монстров в Гроте погибших кораблей.
description.french: Débarrassez la Grotte du Cimetière des navires de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia completamente la Cueva del Cementerio de Barcos.

description.english: Have a Vaal Skill Gem reach level 20.
description.brazilian: Aprimore uma Gema de Habilidade Vaal até o nível 20.
description.russian: Доведите камень умения ваал до 20 уровня.
description.french: Faites évoluer une Gemme d'aptitude vaal jusqu'au niveau 20.
description.spanish: Haz que una Gema de Habilidad Vaal alcance nivel 20.

description.english: Corrupt an item to have a white socket.
description.brazilian: Corrompa um item para ter um encaixe branco.
description.russian: Оскверните предмет, создав белое гнездо.
description.german: Verderbt einen Gegenstand, um eine weiße Fassung zu erhalten.
description.french: Obtenez une châsse blanche après avoir corrompu un objet.
description.spanish: Corrompe un ítem para que tenga un engarce blanco.

description.english: Have 60 Minions at the same time.
description.brazilian: Tenha 60 Lacaios ao mesmo tempo.
description.russian: Одновременно обладайте 60 приспешниками.
description.french: Possédez 60 créatures à la fois.
description.spanish: Ten 60 Esbirros al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Corrupt a map to have eight mods.
description.brazilian: Corrompa um mapa para ter oito propriedades.
description.russian: Оскверните карту, придав ей восемь свойств.
description.german: Verderbt eine Karte, um acht Modifikatoren zu erhalten.
description.french: Obtenez huit affixes après avoir corrompu une Carte.
description.spanish: Corrompe un mapa para que tenga ocho modificadores.

description.english: Kill another player in any mode or league.
description.german: Tötet einen Spieler in einem beliebigen Modus oder Liga.
description.french: Tuez un autre joueur dans n'importe quelle ligue ou mode de jeu.
description.spanish: Mata a otro jugador en cualquier modo o liga.
description.russian: Убейте другого игрока в любом режиме или лиге.
description.brazilian: Mate um jogador em qualquer modo de liga.

description.english: Corrupt a map into a Vaal Temple map.
description.brazilian: Corrompa um mapa em um mapa de Templo Vaal.
description.russian: Оскверните карту 78 уровня, превратив в карту храма ваал.
description.german: Verderbt eine Karte, um eine 'Vaal-Tempel'-Karte zu erhalten.
description.french: Obtenez un Temple vaal après avoir corrompu une Carte.
description.spanish: Corrompe un mapa para obtener un mapa de Templo Vaal.

description.english: Corrupt a skill gem into a Vaal skill gem.
description.brazilian: Corrompa uma gema de habilidade em uma gema de habilidade Vaal.
description.russian: Оскверните камень умения, превратив его в камень умений ваал.
description.german: Verderbt eine Fertigkeitengemme, um eine Vaal-Fertigkeitengemme zu erhalten.
description.french: Obtenez une Gemme d'aptitude vaal après avoir corrompu une Gemme d'aptitude.
description.spanish: Corrompe una gema de habilidad para obtener una gema de habilidad Vaal.

description.english: Enhance a map with a Vaal fragment.
description.brazilian: Aprimore um mapa com um fragmento Vaal.
description.russian: Улучшите карту с помощью фрагмента ваал.
description.german: Verbessert eine Karte mit einem Vaalfragment.
description.french: Améliorez une Carte à l'aide d'un Fragment vaal.
description.spanish: Mejora un mapa con un fragmento Vaal.

description.english: Corrupt an item to have a new implicit mod.
description.brazilian: Corrompa um item para obter uma nova propriedade implícita.
description.russian: Оскверните предмет, придав ему новое собственное свойство.
description.german: Verderbt einen Gegenstand, um einen neuen implizierten Modifikator zu erhalten.
description.french: Obtenez un nouveau mod implicite après avoir corrompu un objet.
description.spanish: Corrompe un ítem para que tenga un nuevo modificador implícito.

description.english: Fully clear the Apex of Sacrifice.
description.german: Tötet Atziri in 'Die Spitze der Opferung'.
description.french: Tuez Atziri dans l'Apex du Sacrifice.
description.spanish: Mata a Atziri en la Cumbre del Sacrificio
description.russian: Убейте Атзири на Вершине жертвоприношений.
description.brazilian: Mate Atiziri no Ápice do Sacrifício

description.english: Fully clear the Colosseum end-game Map.
description.russian: Полностью зачистите Карту колизея.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente o Mapa do endgame Coliseu.
description.french: Débarrassez la Carte de fin de jeu Colisée de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia completamente el Mapa de fin de juego del Coliseo.

description.english: Fully clear The Harvest.
description.russian: Полностью зачистите Жатву.
description.brazilian: Limpe completamente a Colheita.
description.french: Débarrassez la Moisson de tous ses monstres.
description.spanish: Limpia completamente La Cosecha.

description.english: Kill Voll, Emperor of Purity.
description.russian: Убейте Волла, Императора Чистоты.
description.brazilian: Mate Voll, Imperador da Pureza.
description.french: Tuez Voll, Empereur de la pureté.
description.spanish: Mata a Voll, Emperador de Pureza.

description.english: Kill Shavronne of Umbra.
description.french: Tuez Shavronne de l'Umbra.
description.spanish: Mata a Shavronne de Umbra.
description.russian: Убейте Шавронн Тёмную.
description.brazilian: Mate Shavronne da Umbra.

description.english: Kill Doedre Darktongue.
description.french: Tuez Doedre Sombrelangue.
description.spanish: Mata a Doedre Lengua Negra.
description.russian: Убейте Доэдре Темного оратора.
description.brazilian: Mate Doedre Língua Negra.

description.english: Kill Maligaro, The Inquisitor.
description.french: Tuez Maligaro, l'Inquisiteur.
description.spanish: Mata a Malígaro, El Inquisidor.
description.russian: Убейте дознавателя Малигаро.
description.brazilian: Mate Maligaro, O Inquisidor.

description.english: Kill the Eater of Souls in the Core end-game Map.
description.russian: Убейте Пожирателя душ на Карте сердца.
description.brazilian: Mate o Devorador de Almas no Mapa do endgame Núcleo.
description.german: Tötet den Seelenverschlinger in der Endgame-Karte 'Schwarzer Kern'.
description.french: Tuez le Mangeur d'âmes qui réside dans la Carte de fin de jeu Cœur.
description.spanish: Mata al Devorador de Almas en el Mapa de fin de juego del Núcleo.

description.english: Hand in a Full Set of Divination Cards to Tasuni.
description.russian: Обменяйте у Тасуни полную колоду Гадальных карт.
description.brazilian: Entregue um Conjunto Completo de Cartas de Adivinhação ao Tasuni.
description.german: Löst bei Tasuni ein volles Set Weissagungskarten ein.
description.french: Remettez à Tasuni un jeu complet de Cartes divinatoires.
description.spanish: Entrega una Baraja Completa de Cartas de Adivinación a Tasuni.

description.english: Kill Malachai, The Nightmare.
description.russian: Убейте Малахая Кошмара всеми классами.
description.brazilian: Mate Malachai, O Pesadêlo.
description.french: Tuez Malachai, le Cauchemar.
description.spanish: Mata a Malachai, La Pesadilla.

description.english: Reserve 95% or more of your Life.
description.russian: Удержите умениями 95% здоровья.
description.brazilian: Reserve 95% ou mais da sua Vida.
description.french: Réservez au moins 95% de votre Vie.
description.spanish: Reserva el 95% o más de tu Vida.

description.english: Land the killing blow on the Vaal Oversoul while you have the Fortify Buff active.
description.russian: Нанесите смертельный удар Вседуше Ваал, когда вы защищены Укреплением.
description.brazilian: Cause um golpe abatedor em uma Sobrealma vaal quando você possuir o bônus Foritificar ativo.
description.german: Landet den tödlichen Treffer gegen die Vaal-Überseele, während Eure Stärkung 'Verstärken' aktiv ist.
description.french: Assénez le coup fatal à l'Âme souveraine vaal pendant que vous êtes sous l'effet de Renforcement.
description.spanish: Inflige el golpe fatal al Alma Suprema Vaal mientras tienes activo el Bonus Fortificar.

displayName.spanish: Un Extraño en una Tierra Extraña

description.english: Kill a Rogue Exile in Kaom's Stronghold.
description.russian: Убейте бродячего изнанника в крепости Каома.
description.brazilian: Mate um Exilado Renegado no Forte de Kaom.
description.german: Tötet einen abtrünnigen Verbannten in Kaoms Feste.
description.french: Tuez un Exilé renégat dans le Bastion de Kaom.
description.spanish: Mata a un Exiliado Renegado en la Fortaleza de Kaom.

description.english: Land the killing blow on the Burning Man while you are burning.
description.russian: Убейте Горящего человека, когда сами горите.
description.brazilian: Cause um golpe abatedor em um Homem Incendiado enquanto ele queima.
description.german: Landet den tödlichen Treffer gegen den brennenden Mann, während Ihr brennt.
description.french: Assénez le coup fatal sur L'Homme qui brûle pendant que vous êtes vous-même en train de brûler.
description.spanish: Inflige el golpe fatal al Hombre en Llamas mientras estás quemado.

description.english: Open a Vaal Vessel in a corrupted zone.
description.russian: Откройте сосуд ваал в осквернённой области.
description.brazilian: Abra um Vaso vaal em uma zona corrompida.
description.german: Öffnet in einer verderbten Zone ein Gefäß der Vaal.
description.french: Ouvrez un Réceptacle vaal dans une Zone corrompue.
description.spanish: Abre un Recipiente Vaal en una zona corrupta.

description.english: Equip each Maraketh Weapon type.
description.russian: Возьмите в руки все виды оружия маракетов.
description.brazilian: Equipe cada tiop de Arma Maraketh.
description.german: Rüstet jede Art von Maraketh-Waffe aus.
description.french: Équipez-vous de chaque type d'arme maraketh.
description.spanish: Equípate cada tipo de Arma Maraketh.

description.english: Craft a Jewel with four mods using an Orb of Alchemy.
description.russian: Создайте самоцвет с 4 свойствами, используя сферу алхимии.
description.brazilian: Crie uma Joia com quatro mods utilizando um Orbe da Alquimia.
description.german: Fertigt mit einer Sphäre der Alchemie ein Juwel mit vier Modifikatoren an.
description.french: À l'aide d'un Orbe d'alchimie, fabriquez un Joyau doté de quatre mods.
description.spanish: Fabrica una Joya con cuatro modificadores usando un Orbe de Alquimia.

description.english: Corrupt a Unique Jewel into a different Unique Jewel.
description.russian: Оскверните уникальный самоцвет в новый уникальный самоцвет.
description.brazilian: Corrompa uma Joia Única em uma Joia Única diferente.
description.german: Verderbt ein einzigartiges Juwel, sodass es zu einem anderen einzigartigen Juwel wird.
description.french: Corrompez un Joyau unique en un autre.
description.spanish: Corrompe una Joya Única para obtener otra Joya Única diferente.

description.english: Equip a Unique Jewel with a radius.
description.russian: Вставьте в дерево пассивных умений уникальный самоцвет с радиусом действия.
description.brazilian: Equipe uma Joia Única com raio.
description.german: Fasst ein einzigartiges Juwel mit einem Radius ein.
description.french: Équipez-vous d'un Joyau unique doté d'un rayon d'effet.
description.spanish: Equípate una Joya Única que tenga radio.

description.english: Find all of the Shaper's Memory Fragments.
description.russian: Найдите все потерянные фрагменты памяти Создателя.
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os Fragmentos de Memórias do Criador.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les Bribes de souvenir du Façonneur.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los Fragmentos de Memoria del Creador.

description.english: Complete Part 1.
description.russian: Завершите Первую Часть.
description.brazilian: Complete a Parte 1.
description.french: Finissez la première partie.
description.spanish: Completa la Parte 1.

description.english: Kill Tsoagoth, the Brine King
description.russian: Убейте Тсоагота, Морского царя.
description.brazilian: Mate Tsoagoth, o Rei da Salmoura.
description.french: Tuez Tsoagoth, le Roi des Embruns.
description.spanish: Mata a Tsoagoth, el Rey del Mar.

description.english: Kill Arakaali, Spinner of Shadows.
description.russian: Убейте Аракаали, Прядильщицу теней.
description.brazilian: Mate Arakaali, Fiandeira das Sombras.
description.french: Tuez Arakaali, Tisseuse d'ombres.
description.spanish: Mata a Arakaali, la Hilandera de Sombras.

description.english: Kill both Lunaris and Solaris in the same encounter.
description.russian: Убейте Лунарис и Солярис в одной битве.
description.brazilian: Mate Lunaris e Solaris no mesmo encontro.
description.german: Tötet Lunaris und Solaris im gleichen Gefecht.
description.french: Tuez Lunaris et Solaris lors de la même confrontation.
description.spanish: Mata a Lunaris y a Solaris en el mismo encuentro.

description.english: Kill the Depraved Trinity.
description.russian: Убейте Порочную троицу.
description.brazilian: Mate a Trindade Depravada.
description.french: Tuez la Trinité dépravée.
description.spanish: Mata a la Trinidad Depravada.

description.english: Complete Part 2.
description.russian: Завершите Вторую Часть.
description.brazilian: Complete a Parte 2.
description.french: Finissez la deuxième partie.
description.spanish: Completa la Parte 2.

description.english: Have a Voidstone socketed in your Atlas.
description.german: Habt in Eurem Atlas einen Leerenstein eingesetzt.
description.french: Insérez une Pierre du néant dans votre Atlas.
description.spanish: Ten una Roca del vacío engarzada en tu Atlas.
description.russian: Поместите Камень Пустоты в ваш Атлас.
description.brazilian: Encaixe uma Pedra do Vazio em seu Atlas.s no Atlas.

description.english: Have two Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.german: Habt in Eurem Atlas zwei Leerensteine eingesetzt.
description.french: Insérez deux Pierres du néant dans votre Atlas.
description.spanish: Ten dos Rocas del vacío engarzadas en tu Atlas.
description.russian: Поместите два Камня Пустоты в ваш Атлас.
description.brazilian: Encaixe duas Pedras do Vazio em seu Atlas.

description.english: Have three Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.german: Habt in Eurem Atlas drei Leerensteine eingesetzt.
description.french: Insérez trois Pierres du néant dans votre Atlas.
description.spanish: Ten tres Rocas del vacío engarzadas en tu Atlas.
description.russian: Поместите три Камня Пустоты в ваш Атлас.
description.brazilian: Encaixe três Pedras do Vazio em seu Atlas.

description.english: Complete every map on the Atlas.
description.russian: Завершите каждую карту на Атласе.
description.brazilian: Complete todos mapas no Atlas.
description.german: Schließt alle Karten auf dem Atlas ab.
description.french: Terminez toutes les Cartes de l'Atlas.
description.spanish: Completa cada mapa en el Atlas.

description.english: Complete the Hall of Grandmasters.
description.russian: Завершите карту Зал Великих мастеров.
description.brazilian: Complete o Salão dos Grão-Mestres.
description.french: Terminez l'Assemblée des Grands maîtres.
description.spanish: Completa el Salón de los Grandes Maestros.

description.english: Kill Atziri in the Alluring Abyss.
description.french: Tuez Atziri dans l'Abîme envoûtant.
description.spanish: Mata a Atziri en el Abismo Atrayente.
description.russian: Убейте Атзири в Манящей бездне.
description.brazilian: Mate Atziri no Abismo Encantador.

description.english: Apply an Awakened Sextant to a Voidstone.
description.german: Wendet einen Erweckten Sextanten auf einen Leerenstein an.
description.french: Utilisez un Sextant éveillé sur une Pierre du néant.
description.spanish: Aplica un Sextante despertado en una Roca del vacío.
description.russian: Примените пробуждённый секстант к Камню Пустоты.
description.brazilian: Aplique um Sextante Desperto em uma Pedra do Vazio.

description.english: Kill every Breachlord.
description.russian: Убейте каждого Повелителя Разлома.
description.brazilian: Mate cada um dos Lordes da Fenda.
description.french: Tuez tous les Seigneurs de brèche.
description.spanish: Mata a cada Señor de Fisura.

description.english: Choose an Ascendancy class.
description.russian: Выберите класс Восхождения.
description.brazilian: Escolha uma Classe Ascendente.
description.french: Choisissez une classe d'Ascendance.
description.spanish: Elige una clase de Ascendencia.

description.english: Complete the Vinktar Square
description.french: Terminez la Place de Vinktar.
description.spanish: Completa La plaza de Vinktar
description.russian: Пройдите Площадь Винктара
description.brazilian: Complete a Praça Vinktar

description.english: Kill the Shaper.
description.russian: Убейте Создателя.
description.brazilian: Mate o Criador.
description.french: Terrassez le Façonneur.
description.spanish: Derrota al Creador.

description.english: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a non-Hardcore league.
description.german: Schließt das Endgame-Labyrinth in einer Nicht-Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Éternel dans une ligue non Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Eterno en una liga no Hardcore.
description.russian: Завершите Лабиринт Вечных в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.brazilian: Complete o Labirinto Avançado em uma Liga não Hardcore.

description.english: Complete the Eternal Labyrinth in a Hardcore League.
description.german: Schließt das Endgame-Labyrinth in einer Hardcore-Liga ab.
description.french: Terminez le Labyrinthe Éternel dans une ligue Hardcore.
description.spanish: Completa el Laberinto Eterno en una liga Hardcore.
description.russian: Завершите Лабиринт Вечных в лиге без ограничений на возрождения.
description.brazilian: Complete o Labirinto Avançado em uma Liga Hardcore.

description.english: Kill High Templar Dominus.
description.french: Tuez Dominus, Haut Templier.
description.spanish: Mata al Alto Templario Dóminus.
description.russian: Убейте Владыку, Верховного жреца.
description.brazilian: Mate o Alto Templário Dominus.

description.english: Kill Argus.
description.french: Tuez Argus.
description.spanish: Mata a Argus.
description.russian: Убейте Аргуса.
description.brazilian: Mate o Argus.

description.english: Kill Izaro and have him drop 3 treasure keys.
description.german: Tötet Izaro, der daraufhin 3 Schatzschlüssel fallen lässt.
description.french: Tuez Izaro de façon à ce qu'il vous cède 3 Clés du trésor.
description.spanish: Mata a Izaro para que arroje 3 Llaves del Tesoro
description.russian: Убейте Изаро и выбейте из него 3 ключа от сокровищницы.
description.brazilian: Mate o Izaro e faça com que ele derrube 3 chaves do tesouro.

description.english: Kill a god and obtain their power.
description.german: Tötet einen Gott und macht Euch seine Kraft zu eigen.
description.french: Tuez un dieu et emparez-vous de son pouvoir.
description.spanish: Mata un dios y obtén su poder.
description.russian: Убейте бога и заберите его силу.
description.brazilian: Mate um deus e obtenha seu poder.

description.english: Equip two unique items with the same name.
description.german: Rüstet zwei einzigartige Gegenstände mit demselben Namen aus.
description.french: Équipez-vous de deux Objets uniques portant le même nom.
description.spanish: Equipa dos ítems únicos con el mismo nombre.
description.russian: Наденьте два уникальных предмета с одинаковым названием.
description.brazilian: Equipe dois itens únicos com o mesmo nome.

description.english: Complete a map area that is affected by 10 or more mods. This can include mods from Sextants and other mods that are not on the map item.
description.german: Schließt eine Karte mit 10 oder mehr Modifikatoren ab. Sextanten-Modifikatoren oder andere Modifikatoren, die nicht Teil der Karte sind, fließen auch in die Berechnung ein.
description.french: Terminez une Carte qui est influencée par 10 mods ou plus. Vous pouvez vous aider de Sextants et d'autres mods qui ne sont pas intrinsèques à la Carte.
description.spanish: Completa un área de mapa que esté afectada por 10 o más modificadores. Esto puede incluir modificadores de Sextantes y otros modificadores que no se encuentren en el ítem mapa.
description.russian: Завершите карту с 10 или более свойствами. Учитываются свойства секстантов и другие полученные на карте свойства.
description.brazilian: Complete um mapa que está sendo afetado por 10 ou mais mods. Isso pode incluir mods de Sextantes e outros mods que não estão no item mapa.

description.english: Open a map in the map device and step through its portal.
description.german: Öffnet eine Karte im Kartenapparat und tretet durch das Portal.
description.french: À l'aide du Dispositif cartographique, ouvrez une Carte en entrez dans l'un de ses portails.
description.spanish: Abre un mapa en el artefacto de mapas y atraviesa su portal.
description.russian: Откройте карту в машине картоходца и войдите в один из открывшихся порталов.
description.brazilian: Abra um mapa no dispositivo de mapas e entre em seu portal.

description.english: Kill Beidat, Archangel of Death.
description.french: Tuez Beïdat, l'Archange de la mort.
description.spanish: Mate o Beidat, Arcanjo da Morte.
description.russian: Убейте Беидата, Архангела смерти
description.brazilian: Mate o Beidat, Arcanjo da Morte.

displayName.spanish: Todo en un Día de Trabajo

description.english: Complete a Master's Atlas Objective.
description.german: Schließt ein Atlas-Bonusziel eines Meisters ab.
description.french: Terminez l'Objectif d'Atlas d'un Maître.
description.spanish: Completa un Objetivo de Mapa de Maestro.
description.russian: Завершите задание Атласа.
description.brazilian: Complete Objetivos dos Mestres no Atlas.

description.english: Defeat each Master's most dangerous foe.
description.german: Vernichtet den gefährlichsten Feind jedes Meisters.
description.french: Atteignez le niveau de décoration maximal avec tous les Maîtres..
description.spanish: Derrota al enemigo más peligroso de cada maestro.
description.russian: Победите самого опасного противника каждого Мастера.
description.brazilian: Evolua todos os Mestres ao seu Nível de Decoração máximo.

description.english: Obtain every Pantheon power.
description.german: Macht Euch jede Pantheon-Kraft zu eigen.
description.french: Obtenez tous les pouvoirs du Panthéon.
description.spanish: Obtén cada poder del Panteón.
description.russian: Получите силу каждого бога Пантеона.
description.brazilian: Obtenha todos poderes do Panteão.

description.english: Fully upgrade every god power.
description.german: Erweitert jede Gotteskraft so weit wie möglich.
description.french: Améliorez au maximum tous les pouvoirs des dieux.
description.spanish: Mejora completamente todos los poderes de los dioses.
description.russian: Полностью улучшите каждую силу бога.
description.brazilian: Aprimore completamente cada poder de deus.

description.english: Corrupt an Essence monster with a Remnant of Corruption.
description.german: Verderbt ein Essenz-Monster mit einem Relikt der Verderbtheit.
description.french: Corrompez un monstre d'Essence à l'aide d'un Vestige de corruption.
description.spanish: Corrompe un monstruo de Esencia con un Remanente de Corrupción.
description.russian: Оскверните Следом порчи монстра с Сущностью.
description.brazilian: Corrompa um monstro de Essência com um Resquício de Corrupção.

description.english: Kill a monster that is under the influence of five Essence mods.
description.german: Tötet ein Monster, das unter dem Einfluss von fünf Essenz-Modifikatoren steht.
description.french: Tuez un monstre qui se trouve sous l'influence de cinq Essences.
description.spanish: Mata un monstruo que se encuentre bajo la influencia de cinco modificadores de Esencia.
description.russian: Убейте монстра с 5 Сущностями.
description.brazilian: Mate um monstro que está sob influência de cinco mods de Essência.

description.english: Kill all Warbands leaders.
description.french: Tuez tous les chefs de Bataillons.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los líderes de Bandas de Guerra.
description.russian: Убейте всех главарей отрядов.
description.brazilian: Mate todos líderes Bandoleiros.

description.english: Use an orb to change the mods of a Strongbox.
description.german: Benutzt eine Sphäre, um die Modifikatoren eines Tresors zu verändern.
description.french: Utilisez un orbe afin d'altérer les mods d'un Coffre-fort.
description.spanish: Usa un orbe para cambiar los modificadores de una Caja Fuerte.
description.russian: Используйте сферу на ларце, чтобы изменить его свойства.
description.brazilian: Use um orbe para mudar os mods de um Cofre.

description.english: Have four Voidstones socketed in your Atlas.
description.german: Habt in jeder Region Eures Atlas vier Wächtersteine eingesetzt.
description.french: Insérez quatre Pierres de veille dans chacune des Régions de votre Atlas.
description.spanish: Engarza cuatro Rocas del vigilante en cada región de tu Atlas.
description.russian: Поместите по четыре Камня Хранителей в каждый регион вашего Атласа.
description.brazilian: Tenha quatro Pedras Sentinela encaixadas em cada Região do seu Atlas.

description.english: Defeat Sirus, Awakener of Worlds.
description.french: Terrassez Sirus, l'Éveilleur de Mondes.
description.spanish: Derrota a Sirus, Despertador de Mundos
description.russian: Победите Сируса, Пробудителя миров
description.brazilian: Derrote Sirius, Precursor de Mundos

description.english: Accept The Maven's Invitation and defeat The Maven.
description.german: Nehmt die Einladung der Seherin an und vernichtet die Seherin.
description.french: Acceptez l'Invitation de la Prodige et terrassez-la.
description.spanish: Acepta la Invitación de la Especialista y derrota a la Especialista.
description.russian: Примите приглашение Мейвен и победите Мейвен
description.brazilian: Aceite o Convite da Maven e derrote A Maven

description.english: Defeat The Black Star
description.french: Terrassez l'Astre noir.
description.spanish: Derrota a la Estrella negra
description.russian: Победите Чёрное солнце
description.brazilian: Derrote a Estrela Negra

description.english: Defeat The Infinite Hunger
description.french: Terrassez la Faim infinie.
description.spanish: Derrota al Hambre infinita
description.russian: Победите Неутолимый голод
description.brazilian: Derrote a Fome Infinita

description.english: Defeat The Searing Exarch
description.french: Terrassez l'Exarque ardent.
description.spanish: Derrota al Exarca abrasador
description.russian: Победите Пламенного экзарха
description.brazilian: Derrote o Exarca Cauterizado

description.english: Defeat The Eater of Worlds
description.french: Terrassez le Mangeur de mondes.
description.spanish: Derrota al Devorador de mundos
description.russian: Победите Пожирателя миров
description.brazilian: Derrote o Devorador de Mundos
